name: Rec.Reviews
author: Presta-Module

sections.description:
The quality and authenticity of videos dedicated to product reviews!

Invite your customers to send you a video review of your products, after their purchase.
Adopt now the “User Generated Content” strategy and make your customers your best ambassadors by sharing their video reviews on your social networks.

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rec-reviews directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Install and activate WooCommerce if you haven’t already done so
  4. Link your Rec.Reviews account using the dedicated button
  5. Wait for reviews üôÇ
